subject: XMLUnit: Namespace prefixes in XPaths
msgSnippet: I m trying to use XMLUnit to check SOAP messages. There I m stuck with the problem that most everything in such a message has a namespace prefix. Now I m
messageBody:
I'm trying to use XMLUnit to check SOAP messages. There I'm stuck with
the problem that most everything in such a message has a namespace
prefix. Now I'm looking for a way to associate namespaces to prefixes
in an XPath query.

Michael

--
Michael Schuerig This is not a false alarm
mailto:michael@... This is not a test
http://www.schuerig.de/michael/ --Rush, Red Tide
